snippet: While once reporting on a vintage-car rally, I spent a day in three Alfa Romeos. The effect was intoxicating, and I vowed to get one. It took a trip to Rome and then a long boat ride for the car, but a Giulia 1300 TI is now in my garage.
abstract: Nick Czap describes quest to own Alfa Romeo automobile, culminating in purchase of 1969 Giulia1300 TI while on trip to Rome.
lead_paragraph: While once reporting on a vintage-car rally, I spent a day in three Alfa Romeos. The effect was intoxicating, and I vowed to get one. It took a trip to Rome and then a long boat ride for the car, but a Giulia 1300 TI is now in my garage.

headline.seo: It Followed Me Home. Can I Keep It?
headline.main: It Followed Me Home. Can I Keep It?
headline.print_headline: It Followed Me Home. Can I Keep It?
